DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_TITLE: Single-cell RNA-sequencing for peripheral blood mononuclear cells and plasma proteomics data from COVID-19 patients and healthy controls of Japanese
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: We performed single-cell RNA-sequencing of peripheral blood mononuclear cells and measured plasma protein expression from COVID-19 patients and healthy controls.
